Text:
Thanks

I Make a OGG Vorbis Version from this rip

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4786062/

My third opera - almost 40 years ago - was "La traviata" with Moffo and Merrill (and a tenor nobody ever heard of before or since).  I subsequently heard all three of these great singers dozens of times.  I am such a die-hard Callas fanatic that I almost can't listen to anyone but Callas as Violetta, but this recording brings back good memories - and reminds me to keep an open mind.  Many thanks!
